mapper.insert:
select NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(EMP_NUM), 1, 3), 'EMP') || TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUBSTR(MAX(EMP_NUM),4),0)+1, '000')) FROM EMP
MERGE INTO EMP A --대상 테이블 USING DUAL ON(A.EMP_NUM = #{empNum}) WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET EMP_NM = #{empNm}, EMP_PHE =#{empPhe}, EMP_ADDR = #{empAddr}, EMP_PAY = #{empPay}, EMP_MJ_NUM = #{empMjNum} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (EMP_NUM, EMP_ADDR, EMP_PHE, EMP_NM, EMP_PAY, EMP_MJ_NUM) VALUES(#{empNum},#{empAddr},#{empPhe},#{empNm},#{empPay},#{empMjNum})
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NUM, EMP_ADDR, EMP_PHE, EMP_NM, EMP_PAY , EMP_MJ_NUM FROM EMP ORDER BY EMP_NUM
SELECT EMP_NUM, EMP_ADDR, EMP_PHE, EMP_NM, EMP_PAY, EMP_MJ_NUM FROM EMP START WITH EMP_MJ_NUM IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR EMP_NUM = EMP_MJ_NUM
